00030 #ifndef ERRORCL_HEADER
00031 #define ERRORCL_HEADER
00032 
00033 // prj
00034 #include "pobjcl.h"
00035 #include "stypes.h"
00036 
00037 extern struct id_element error_on_off_names[];
00038 
00039 enum error_on_off {
00040   ERROR_PARENT,
00041   ERROR_ON,
00042   ERROR_OFF
00043 };
00044 
00045 const int err_stop= (err_unknown|err_error);
00046 
00047 #define ERROR_CLASS_DECL(NAME) \
00048 extern class cl_error_class error_##NAME##_class;\
00049 class cl_error_##NAME
00050 
00051 #define ERROR_CLASS_DEF_PARENT(TYPE,NAME,CLASS_NAME,PARENT) \
00052 class cl_error_class error_##NAME##_class(TYPE, CLASS_NAME, &(PARENT))
00053 
00054 #define ERROR_CLASS_DEF_PARENT_ON(TYPE,NAME,CLASS_NAME,PARENT,ON) \
00055 class cl_error_class error_##NAME##_class(TYPE, CLASS_NAME, &(PARENT), ON)
00056 
00057 
00058 extern class cl_list *registered_errors;
00059 
00060 class cl_error_class: public cl_base
00061 {
00062 protected:
00063   enum error_type type;
00064   //char *name;
00065   enum error_on_off on;
00066 public:
00067   cl_error_class(enum error_type typ, char *aname);
00068   cl_error_class(enum error_type typ, char *aname,
00069                  enum error_on_off be_on);
00070   cl_error_class(enum error_type typ, char *aname,
00071                  class cl_error_class *parent);
00072   cl_error_class(enum error_type typ, char *aname,
00073                  class cl_error_class *parent,
00074                  enum error_on_off be_on);
00075   
00076   enum error_on_off get_on(void) { return(on); }
00077   void set_on(enum error_on_off val);
00078   bool is_on(void);
00079   enum error_type get_type(void);
00080   char *get_type_name(void);
00081   //char *get_name(void);
00082 };
00083 
00084 extern class cl_error_class error_class_base;
00085 
00086 
00087 class cl_commander; //forward
00088 
00089 class cl_error: public cl_base
00090 {
00091 protected:
00092   class cl_error_class *classification;
00093 public:
00094   bool inst;    // Occured during instruction execution
00095   t_addr PC;    // Address of the instruction
00096 public:
00097   cl_error(void);
00098   virtual ~cl_error(void);
00099   virtual int init(void);
00100  
00101 public:
00102   virtual enum error_type get_type(void);
00103   virtual enum error_on_off get_on(void);
00104   virtual bool is_on(void);
00105   virtual class cl_error_class *get_class(void) { return(classification); }
00106 
00107   virtual void print(class cl_commander *c);
00108   virtual char *get_type_name();
00109 };
